Package: build.tmp.groovydoc

[Groovy] Class Evaluator

    • build.tmp.groovydoc.Evaluator

    • Class that evaluates a poker hand to see if it has won or lost

      • Properties Summary

          Properties 
          Type Name and description
          java.util.ArrayList  payouts
          Stores the payout chart and descriptions.

        • java.lang.Integer checkSize(java.util.ArrayList cards, int sizeToCheck)

          Returns the number of cards that whose values show up in the hand multiple times

          Returns:
          Parameters:
          cards
          sizeToCheck - the number of matches to check for.

        • java.util.Map evaluate(Hand hand, int round)

          Cycles through all the check functions to see if the game should pay out for a win. Starts from the end of the results array to make sure the highest possible payout is used.

          Returns:
          Parameters:
          hand
          round

        • java.util.ArrayList ordinalHandler(java.util.ArrayList<java.util.Map> cards)

          Retrieves the numeric value of each card. Groovy's collect closure tells the cards ArrayList that on every card, run the code get("value"), collect those items into a list and return it.

          Returns:
          Parameters:
          cards

        • java.util.ArrayList suitHandler(java.util.ArrayList<java.util.Map> cards)

          Retrieves the suit of each card. Also uses Groovy's collect closure.

          Returns:
          Parameters:
          cards
